description.title: Bridge: create and whitelist token, send and withdraw tokens across the bridge
description.purpose: Deploys ERC20 contracts on the L1, whitelists them and sends tokens across the bridge from the L1 to the L2, and then sends some tokens back from the L2 to the L1. Note that sending tokens from the L2 to the L1 requires the merkle tree proof, as per withdrawing native funds.
